page.title: 19SHOPS
page.content: In 1970 there was a bakery. Ten years ago the Spa grocery shop was opened, it was owned by Mrs.Simpson and they stayed almost two years. Now Mrs.Smith owns the shop,which is also a post office.Theres another shop about half a mile down the road.This shop is a general store.It's one good that the goods are cheap.It's owned by Mr.& Mrs.McCarthy.About 200 yards away there is a butchers shop, Gibbons & Co.They sell joints,sausages and other meat Recently a hairdressers opened near the station. At one time there was a shoemaker in the village. In East chiltington there is a small grocery store with a post office attached there is also a furge. There are some interesting public houses in this area, well supported They are The Sun,The Plough,The Fountain and The Jolly Sportsman.
